blogs.title: Hello!
blogs.body: As a self-taught React developer, I am eager to gain experience and build upon the skills I have acquired through my personal projects. I am seeking an internship or junior developer position where I can contribute to the growth of a company while also learning from experienced professionals. I am a hard worker and committed to continuously improving my knowledge and abilities.
blogs.author: Renato-Niicolas

blogs.title: Hobbies!
blogs.body:
As we go through our daily routine, hobbies play an important role in providing us with a means of relaxation and escape from the stresses of everyday life. Here are some of my favorite hobbies that I enjoy doing in my free time:
Live streaming: I love to interact with my audience and share my thoughts and experiences through live streaming. It gives me a sense of connection and community.
Gaming: Video games are not just a source of entertainment for me, but they also provide a challenging and immersive experience that helps me sharpen my problem-solving skills.
Cooking: Cooking is a way for me to unwind and be creative in the kitchen. It allows me to experiment with new flavors and techniques, and share delicious meals with my loved ones.
Animal caregiver: I have a deep love and respect for animals and enjoy taking care of them. Being an animal caregiver gives me a sense of fulfillment and purpose.
Video editing: Video editing allows me to express my creativity by combining different elements to create something unique and visually appealing.
blogs.author: Renato
